text.intro:
*Hey, I'm Akinator*! ğŸ§
Just think of any character, object or animal, and i will try to guess it! To start playing, type _'start'_. You can also play with me in groups by typing _'aki start'_ 

Made by *Harry!*
text.end: Woo! You Ended you game!You can start a  new game by typing _'play'_ / _'start'_
text.exist: You already have a game going on! type _'stop'_ to end the existing game. Then you can start a new one!.
text.not_your: This question is not for you! Type ```aki start``` to start new game for you!
text.timeout: Your game was deleted due to inactivity. Type ```'start'``` to play again!
